item.title: Weekends at my granny
item.description:
Brief information

For the first 3 days I was in a small city (town) called Uvarovo. My grandfather lives there. I spend a lot of time outside because the weather was amazing and I tried to relax after hectic days in Moscow. After visiting my grandpa I went to my granny to SaratovThis week the whole country celebrated the 9th of May.. Saratov is quite big and famous city. I really like the architecture of this city and the weather is really nice too. However, when I was there the weather was not really plasant: it was rainy, windy and cold. But it didn’t break my plans and I enjoyed talking with my granny about everything.

What I’ve done these days

Even if I had “holidays” I’ve done a lot. Starting with my university studies, I comleted everything for that week for operation systems, prepared for English exam and did some math tasks. I also spend some time doing Korean lessons and started preparation for a new challenge (dialog). Besides, I helped my granny a lot. We’ve cut down a tree, which trew the shadow on granny’s flowers. Then we cleaned a backyard to prepare it all for summer.

Actually, I’ve done everything that I was planning to do, so I can say that this week was relaxing as well as productive.

item.title: Welcomming spring in Moscow
item.description:
Weather

These days the weather was really plesant. The average temperature was about 12-17 degree C. There was a light warm wind somewhere and really clean sky with the shining sun.

Events

Last weekends there was an exhibition of arts of the future. It’s called “Biennale. Art for the future”. There you could see many surprizing and exiting things. The events lasts untill 15th of May. Find more information about it
